title: Remove "Lucene Fields" checkboxes "New" and "Patch Available" from JIRA issues
description:
The LUCENE JIRA project includes a set of checkboxes called "Lucene Fields": "New" and "Patch Available".

I think we should remove these, since AFAIK they are never used.  Also, given the "Patch Available" status used by Yetus to enable automatic patch review, it's confusing to have a separate, unrelated checkbox with the same label.
